ValidationRule.description: Blocks Sales Profile from checking A4S Received Box on "401K" and "SingleK" Opp Record Types
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: ( BEGINS( $Profile.Id , "00e37000000kyMz") || BEGINS( $Profile.Id , "00e1G0000011hij") ) && ( BEGINS( RecordTypeId , "012000000000myo") || BEGINS( RecordTypeId , "012000000000mxg") ) && ISCHANGED( Agreement_for_Services_A4S__c )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Only Billing will complete this for 401(k) or Single(k) Opportunities
